scripts.build: pnpm run build-scripts && pnpm run esbuild
scripts.render-readme: cat README.md | grep -v '^# ' | pnpm exec marked > web/readme.html
scripts.build-web: pnpm run build-scripts && cp node_modules/sanitize.css/sanitize.css web/ && pnpm run update-web
scripts.package: pnpm run build && web-ext build --ignore-files src web *.iml tsconfig.json tsconfig.tsbuildinfo pnpm-lock.yaml
